title: Client application type
mainAdvice: Select all client application types your Solution supports
additionalAdvice: This information will be visible to buyers on your Solution page.
warningAdvice: When revisiting this section please be aware that if you choose to deselect an application type, any data that has been added to that application type will be deleted.
